dict.acceptation: 钉子；指甲，趾甲；钉状物；纳尔；

sent.orig: Nail art will be popular this year.
Stomach annulus umbilical is, ear nail, nose nail, lip nail.
sent.trans: 不锈钢耳钉，肚脐环，鼻钉，唇钉。

sent.orig: When, for instance, we hit a nail with a hammer, we expect the nail to move.
sent.trans: 比如，当我们用锤子敲打钉子时，我们可预知钉子要移动。

sent.orig: Methods 75 cases of spinal vertebrae fracture were treated by RoyCamille plate,Dick nail,RF and AF nail.
sent.trans: 方法 75例脊柱骨折 ，用 Roy- Camille钢板、Dick钉、RF钉、和 AF钉复位固定。
